text: if you need more flexibility, build your html in a custom module.  the drag and drop is based on an older version of bootstrap so you have the 12col row to work with out of the box.  i, personally, work almost exclusively with the custom modules.
Hi Everyone, I'm a designer and front-end developer. Recently started working with HubSpot and have some questions.

Hi Everyone! I'm new to HubSpot, coming from a jr Marketing Operations background (previously using Marketo). In my new role, I'm tasked to optimize the company's current integration between HubSpot, Salesforce and other Marketing tools/activities. Does anyone have a good resource for understanding the ins and outs of the integration.

One example is how to upload bulk list acquisitions into HubSpot that get pushed into SFDC with the correct status. I was told HubSpot pushes contacts into SFDC as responded (which it shouldn't be). Any help would be awesome! Excited to be part of this community :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey <@UJ3F7KNTT> Welcome!  For a general integration overview, this is a good starting point <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/crm-integration-guide/overview>.

In terms of integrating HubSpot and SFDC, is this status the Campaign Member Status or more of a general field (or something different)?
It’s also worth noting the the HubSpot Support team can help you with the SFDC integration

It's the Member status Value. The records that were uploaded directly into SFDC (current process) show "sent". So ideally if HubSpot can do this, that would be helpful.

Also, thanks for the overview. I'll get cracking on reviewing this. Thanks!!

The place to set campaign status is in a HubSpot workflow which you can see from here <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/workflows/choose-your-workflow-actions> in the “Set a Salesforce campaign” section
Interesting. I thought it was that easy, but was told otherwise. I'll try this out and see if it works the way the team would like it to. Really appreciate your prompt help with this! :smile:
